text: ayane, mim'malni oke vyakti nundi srstincadu mariyu atani nundiye jivita saukhyam pondataniki atani bharyanu (jaujanu) puttincadu. Atanu amenu kalusukunnapudu, ame oka telikaina bharanni dharinci danini mostu tirugutu untundi. Pidapa ame garbhabharam adhikamainappudu, varu ubhayulu kalisi vari prabhuvaina allah nu ila vedukuntaru: "Nivu maku manci biddanu prasadiste memu tappaka niku krtajnatalu telipe varamavutamu
